revisionDesc.change: Converted to P5 and hand-tidied where necessary

body.p: DIAMM continually tries to expand its offerings the users of this site. To this end, we have begun to provide resources other than merely digital images. At the moment, these consist of newly completed scholarly editions of music related to the research interests of DIAMM and fully browsable and searchable PhD dissertations also in this area of scholarship.
Please feel free to browse this section of the website and do please contact the project manager if you have a suggestion for what we should also include.
